ygData.subject: Install Cantera from source
ygData.msgSnippet: Dear all, I have MS Visual C++6 and Visual Fortran. I installed Cantera153 from the source. When I typed make win-install in cygwin, it installed the files

Dear all,

I have MS Visual C++6 and Visual Fortran. I installed Cantera153 from 
the source.

When I typed "make win-install" in cygwin, it installed the files for 
Python and suddenly stopped with this error:

chown -R Hoa G Nguyen c:/cantera/demo/python
chown: 'Hoa': invalid user
make: *** [python-install] Error 1

In the cantera folders, there are only 5 folders: data, demos, 
include, lib, tutorials.
There are no bin and docs as in the cantera153-build-win32.pdf.

I can run Cantera well in Python but not in C++. I failed to build 
the examples classes. It cannot open include file: 'Cantera.h' and 
other files too. I'm confused because when I buit the source in C++ 
there was no error.

Thanks,

Hoa Nguyen
